name: Ice Hockey shoot
description: Play this cool and challenging Ice Hockey shooting. Simple and easy but tricky, Your objective is to trick the goalkeeper and get the puck into the goal as many times as you can within 15 shots. Just swipe the screen to shoot the puck with the right power and direction. Ice Hockey shooting is packed with awesome realistic graphics for you to enjoy the experience as if you were right in front of the keeper. Observe him and wait for the right moment to shoot and set the highest score. Have fun with Ice Hockey shooting!
